long_description: Drawing inspiration from the vintage book bag, the Columbia Quickdraw Daypack is light and fast and marvelous in its simplicity. Roomy main compartment stores lunch and books, extra layers and farmer's market goodies. Made of durable polyester with 1 zippered front pocket for small items. Reflective zipper pulls on the Columbia Quickdraw Daypack make you more visible when you're out at night. Closeout.
short_description: Drawing inspiration from the vintage book bag, the Columbia Quickdraw Daypack is light and fast and marvelous in its simplicity.
